text: Stree 2: Sarkate Ka Aatank (transl. Woman 2: The Terror of the Headless) is a 2024 Hindi-language comedy horror movie directed by Amar Kaushik, written by Niren Bhatt, and produced jointly by Maddock Films and Jio Studios. The movie stars Rajkummar Rao, Shraddha Kapoor, Pankaj Tripathi, Abhishek Banerjee and Aparshakti Khurana. It is the sequel to movie Stree (2018). == Cast == * Rajkummar Rao as Vicky * Shraddha Kapoor as a phantasm with no name * Pankaj Tripathi as Rudra, a paranologist * Abhishek Banerjee as Jana, Vicky's friend * Aparshakti Khurana as Bittu, Vickyâ€™s friend * Atul Srivastava as Vicky's father * Mushtaq Khan as MLA * Sunita Rajwar as Jana's mother * Arvind Bilgaiyan as Jana's father * Anya Singh as Chitti * Bhoomi Rajgor as Stree * Sunil Kumar as Sarkata * Aakash Dabhade as Narendra, Jana's friend * Simran Sharma as Mamata, Narendra's wife * Ajay Pal as Postman * Mustaqeem Khan as Durga * Badriprasad Chavan as Lokesh * Vipasha Arvind as Anju Bhabhi * Tamannaah Bhatia as Shama (special appearance in the song "Aaj Ki Raat") * Amar Kaushik (cameo in the song "Aaj Ki Raat") * Varun Dhawan as Bhaskar / Bhediya, Jana's friend (special appearance) * Akshay Kumar (special appearance) == Release == === Theatrical === Stree 2 was originally scheduled for a worldwide theatrical release on 30 August 2024 but was later rescheduled to premiere on Independence Day 2024.https://www.bollywoodhungama.com/news/bollywood/shraddha-kapoor- rajkummar-rao-starrer-stree-2-release-august-15/ === Home media === The movie will premiere on Amazon Prime after its theatrical run. == Music == == References == == Other websites == * * Category:2024 comedy movies Category:2024 horror movies Category:2020s Indian movies
title: Stree 2
